title: PLZ HELP ME!!!!!!!
body: i have this smurf account that i use to play on a while and i want to start playing on it again. However i forgot the password of it and i can not change it or do anything like that because i forgot my email address i used to play lol with. WHAT DO I DO

replies.body:
Hit the big red panic button.

Do you remember *anything* about the account?
